infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SkillSling needs access to your camera to take photos and videos for your profile and services.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SkillSling needs access to your photo library to upload images and videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: SkillSling needs access to your microphone to record videos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: SkillSling needs your location to show nearby service providers.
